price: 87. Nummah Nabii Muusah tawraat kitab neceeh kaak lakal farmoytit kaa katasne, Nabii Qiisa maryam Baxah Baxxaqqa itta Astooti neceeh, Ruucul Qhudsi deqsita jibriilit kaa maqarrosne, tokkel Yallak farmoyti Yallih xaquk yan wacyiy sin nafsi Akcine waat Siinih Amaatinnaanih waqdi kaxxa mariinittan, tokkel isin Ambiyak horta dirabbossaanaah horta keenik Qiddaanaa?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَقَفَّيۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ بِٱلرُّسُلِۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَا عِيسَى ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَأَيَّدۡنَٰهُ بِرُوحِ ٱلۡقُدُسِۗ أَفَكُلَّمَا جَآءَكُمۡ رَسُولُۢ بِمَا لَا تَهۡوَىٰٓ أَنفُسُكُمُ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتُمۡ فَفَرِيقٗا كَذَّبۡتُمۡ وَفَرِيقٗا تَقۡتُلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
